titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to end the investment tax credit for offshore wind facilities in the inland navigable waters of the United States.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to end the investment tax credit for offshore wind facilities in the inland navigable waters of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill eliminates the energy-related tax credit for investment in certain offshore wind facilities after 2021.
